name: Tab Content Header
description: A title with optional description on the left, and a right-aligned action button. The standard header pattern inside tabbed panels, Card sections, and settings group blocks.
notes: border-b border-background-800 and pb-4 separates the header from the content below. Action button is optional — omit when the section is read-only.

variations.name: Minimal
variations.description: Title only — no description or action. For sections that need a heading without extra chrome.

variations.name: With Count Badge
variations.description: Title with a Badge showing an item count — for lists where the number of items is meaningful.
